summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of First Avenue South from Holgate Street to a point 240 feet south of the South margin of Hanford Street in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 23594, creating Local Improvement District No. 2289 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
